00039 #ifdef _NO_BUDDY_SYSTEM
00040 #define Mem_Alloc( a )  malloc( a )
00041 #else
00042 #include "BuddyMalloc.h"
00043 #define Mem_Alloc( a ) BuddyMalloc( a )

00066 #define STUFF_PREALLOC( pool, nb, type, name_next )                       \
00067 do                                                                        \
00068 {                                                                         \
00069   int i = 0 ;                                                             \
00070                                                                           \
00071   pool= NULL ;                                                            \
00072                                                                           \
00073   if( ( pool = ( type *)Mem_Alloc( sizeof( type ) * nb ) ) != NULL )         \
00074     {                                                                     \
00075       for( i = 0 ; i < nb ; i++ )                                         \
00076         {                                                                 \
00077           if( i != nb -1 )                                                \
00078             pool[i].name_next = &(pool[i+1]) ;                            \
00079           else                                                            \
00080             pool[i].name_next = NULL ;                                    \
00081         }                                                                 \
00082     }                                                                     \
00083 } while( 0 )

00105 #define GET_PREALLOC( entry, pool, nb, type, name_next )                  \
00106 do                                                                        \
00107 {                                                                         \
00108                                                                           \
00109   if( ( pool == NULL ) && ( nb != 0 ) )                                   \
00110     STUFF_PREALLOC( pool, nb, type, name_next ) ;                         \
00111                                                                           \
00112   if( pool != NULL )                                                      \
00113     {                                                                     \
00114       entry = pool ;                                                      \
00115       pool = entry->name_next ;                                           \
00116     }                                                                     \
00117   else                                                                    \
00118    entry = NULL ;                                                         \
00119 } while( 0 ) 
00120 
00136 #define RELEASE_PREALLOC( entry, pool, name_next )                        \
00137 do                                                                        \
00138 {                                                                         \
00139   entry->name_next = pool ;                                               \
00140   pool = entry ;                                                          \
00141 } while( 0 )
